rows.label: tlk4632027602_msg0001
rows.name:
Welcome to Goth Isut, the capital
of the Holy See of Acedia.

rows.label: tlk4632027602_msg0002
rows.name:
The people of Acedia live in peace and
harmony thanks to the teachings of
Marveni, our beloved Pope.

rows.label: tlk4632027602_msg0003
rows.name:
Admittedly, our resources are
somewhat strained, due to the influx of
refugees and foreign pilgrims...

rows.label: tlk4632027602_msg0004
rows.name:
We appreciate your forbearance
and do hope you'll enjoy your stay
here despite any inconvenience.
